description: This file defines the ServiceProvisioningService class, which provides various methods for managing services including CRUD operations, deployment, status checks, metrics retrieval, validation, and import/export functionalities. It acts as a client-side wrapper for API calls related to service management.

classes.name: ServiceProvisioningService
classes.description: A class encapsulating API interactions for managing services and their deployment lifecycle.

methods.name: getServices
methods.description: Fetches a paginated list of services with optional search filtering.

methods.name: getService
methods.description: Retrieves details of a specific service by ID.

methods.name: createService
methods.description: Creates a new service with provided data.

methods.name: updateService
methods.description: Updates an existing service identified by ID.

methods.name: deployService
methods.description: Deploys a service to target devices.

methods.name: undeployService
methods.description: Undeploys a service from target devices.

methods.name: getServiceStatus
methods.description: Retrieves current status information of a service.

methods.name: getServiceMetrics
methods.description: Fetches metrics related to a service, optionally within a specific time range.

methods.name: getServiceLogs
methods.description: Retrieves logs for a service, with optional limit and level filtering.

methods.name: validateServiceConfiguration
methods.description: Validates a service configuration prior to deployment.

methods.name: previewServiceDeployment
methods.description: Provides a preview of commands to be executed during deployment.

methods.name: getDeploymentHistory
methods.description: Retrieves deployment history for a service.

methods.name: rollbackService
methods.description: Rolls back a service to a previous deployment.

methods.name: cloneService
methods.description: Creates a new service by cloning an existing one.

methods.name: exportService
methods.description: Exports the configuration of a service.

methods.name: importService
methods.description: Imports a service configuration from a file.
